rooms.description: Spacious living area with traditional Kerala-style elements and Vastu-compliant orientation. Includes large windows for natural light.
Adjacent dining space integrated within the open plan layout to encourage family interactions.
Functional kitchen area with modern amenities while retaining traditional Kerala aesthetics and adherence to Vastu principles.
Private master suite designed for personal space; includes an ensuite bathroom adhering to privacy and Vastu guidelines.
Additional bedroom suitable for children or guest use with Vastu-compliant orientation.
Common bathroom designed in accordance with local norms and efficient space utilization.

openings.description: Wide door connecting the living room to the kitchen for open plan flow.
Large window on the south wall of the living area, following Vastu guidelines for sunlight and ventilation.
Door connecting the living room to the master bedroom, ensuring privacy while maintaining access.
